title: Very slow and starts again?
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `Geth 1.6.7`
OS & Version: Windows 10

Since 5 Days i try to sync the blockchain but id i go to bed the wallet shows "34% downloaded" if i wake up, i see 5% 🈂️ 
Now i use the geth.exe in comment line and use
`geth -rpc`

But it take too much time.....or is it right? I have no SSD
```
INFO [06-23|19:59:37] Imported new chain segment               blocks=42  txs=305  mgas=14.259 elapsed=8.423s    mgasps=1.693  number=1956405 hash=c774bb…ccf7a7

```

I have a good graphical card but a slow CPU but is it the right way to go mining?

I have now bought and installed an SSD. Nevertheless, a block still takes 8 seconds!
For over 7 days now try to load the blockchain down but it takes forever. Is that normal or do something wrong with me
`geth -rpc`
a lot of time i get this too:
WARN [06-24|23:06:03] Synchronisation failed, retrying         err="block download canceled (requested)"`
`
I think something is wrong in the network, that can not be so wanted, right?


This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
